post.body: It was a great night, for sure.
Do it.
Boss gave me a dozen tickets to their Christmas show last night.
Never paid much attention but got free tix to a show last night and was impressed. I avoid Christian music unless it's worship stuff
intense stuff!
I worked in country for 5 yrs so this is a nice switch. Can I ask a stupid ? What's DH? I hear it alot, and feel dumb. Ha!
I'm so late to the party - amazing stuff.
I heard it for the first time last night and the lyrics about knocked me over.
This particular rehearsal is for church - worship team stuff.
I play guitar. And this week I guess I'm singing? I don't know, we'll see how it goes when I get there... haha
This line-USA looks like another silent night, as we're sung to sleep by philosophies, that save the trees and kill the children
I heard it last night for the first time at their Christmas show and was absolutely floored.
I have rehearsal on Saturday mornings at 830. :-) And good morning to you too!
Just got home! I do live off the internet, too... ;-)
Yep! Hey! :-)
Unless you stop the bleeding, the problem persists.
Actually I lied. I'm wearing a dress.
At least I'm wearing pants Brodigan.
I know right? *sigh* My life is so difficult... ;-)
You're right - although, I came to that conclusion on Nov 5th when I got nasty IMs and text messages from my liberal friends...
Thanks so much!
Fantastic, thanks. :-)
For sure! I am not a fan of rain when I've got to be out and about.
Perfect. Thanks for asking. :-)
Happy birthday!!
Ha! I'm still waiting for it to warm up as well.....
good morning, lady!
For sure... I'm finally catching up on my work. Real job gets in the way of blogging and twittering...
Hey you. Alright so far! But I'm just gettin' going - long day ahead of me. Should be a good one though! And it isn't snowing. :-)
I forgot Christmas was as close as it is - I still have tons of shopping to do. Luckily, we're only going in for the kids this year
... which is reason # 87 why you shouldn't live in MI. ;-)
That's right, you west coaster... why are you on Twitter at 630 am? I'd so still be in bed if I had an option.
Lucky you! Mine's just getting started.... it's gonna be a long one!
The battery is holding charge, it's just not getting any power through the charger. I have had power source issues before...
My charger is shot. At least that's what I think it is.
I rarely drink liquor but when I do it's Jack
good. That's all I can offer. You know, since I work for free and all.
are you going you CPAC? You know they require pants right?
I know how much you miss me. Try to hold it together. You'll make it.
You're so hired. Do you work for personal gratification? Because that's what I can offer
indeed it does. Mom just kept giving me Brandy thinking it would make me better...
Wait I have a staff??
I'm pretty positive he'll survive it. Wont you @Linc4Justice?
Well, I did it... Probably part of the reason I couldn't talk yesterday.
I know right? Should be up and running soon. And I will be back at work Monday. :-)
Perfect! Except for the part where I was deathly ill.
I agree. But that's what I get for being the only single one left!
Out and about! Spending the day with family... My computer is down for a couple days...
But she's playing Guitar Hero!! ;-)
I know. I'm sorry. You'll pull through - I have faith. ;-)
I'm in 3 in the next 5 months. It's out of control.
Okay I'm off ya'll. Have a fabulous morning!!
has anyone heard the Casting Crowns song While You Were Sleeping?
Okay off for the night - DM or email if necessary. :-)
New Post: Effects of Corruption. http://tinyurl.com/5ux2es
Okay guys I'm off for the night. You can DM me - but I probably won't answer. Have a good one!!
These phones and faxes are completely out of control today.... it's getting in the way of my blogging. ;-)
New Post: Through The Eyes Of A Liberal... http://tinyurl.com/6gnb43
Sorry guys - I can only tweet so fast from my phone!! I'm off for a while... keep talking amongst yourselves... have a great night!!
These Guitar Hero girls are trashtastic.
